name: special-event
description: Represents a BACnet special event, defining a period, a list of time values, and an event priority for scheduling.

fields.name: period
fields.description: The period during which the special event is active, specified as a calendar entry or reference.

options.name: calendar-entry
options.description: A specific calendar entry defining the event period.

options.name: calendar-reference
options.description: A reference to a calendar object defining the event period.

fields.name: list-of-time-values
fields.description: A list of time values associated with the special event.

fields.name: event-priority
fields.description: The priority of the special event, from 1 (highest) to 16 (lowest).
